briefTitle: Intravenous Chemotherapy and Plant-based Dietary Supplements
officialTitle: Mono-centric, Prospective, Non-Interventional Study of Quantitative and Qualitative Analysis of Dietary Supplement Taken With Chemotherapy Treatments in Patients With Adjuvant Breast Cancer Taken Care of at the Day Hospital
primaryOutcomeMeasure: evaluate quantitatively the use of dietary supplements in patients during IV chemotherapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer treated by intra-venous chemotherapy
* inclusion at the last cycle (cure)
* all chemotherapy cycles realised at ICO

Exclusion Criteria:

* no breast cancer
* metastatic breast cancer
* not all chemotherapy cycles realised at ICO
* patient who has not finished his chemotherapy
